Prey: Snails, small mammals, lizards, insect larvae, termites, spiders, ants
Fun Fact: In Australia, the chocolate bilby replaces the chocolate bunny for Easter.
Other Name(s): Rabbit-eared bandicoot, rabbit bandicoot, dalgyte, pinkie, jecko
Predators: Monitor lizards, pythons, birds of prey, dingos, feral cats and red foxes
Weight: 1.31 to 5.5 pounds. Males weigh twice as much as females.
Age of Sexual Maturity: Five months for females, eight months for males
Name: Bilby
